title: ***NORTH END-NORTH ST RENOVATED 4BED AVAIL NOW OR 9/1 & NO FEE NEEDED!
posting_body: This bright and sunny apartment boasts 3 large bedrooms with the 4th slightly smaller.
Hardwood floors throughout with natural wood work.
Nice living room area and large eat in kitchen with dish washer & disposal and lots of cabinet storage.
Great location across the street from Paul Revere's house.
Easy access to Haymarket T, restaurants, lots of shops and so much more!
Laundry across the street with wash and fold services if you prefer.
Please email Ben with any questions or to schedule a viewing of the property!
